title: Diwali
description: Festival of lights symbolizing victory of good over evil, celebrated with fireworks and decorations.

title: Holi
description: Colorful spring festival where people throw powders and water, celebrating love and new beginnings.

title: Durga Puja
description: Ten-day festival honoring Goddess Durga, featuring grand processions, music, dance, and cultural events.

title: Pongal
description: Traditional harvest festival expressing gratitude for good crops, celebrated with feasts and bonfires.

title: Onam
description: Cultural festival featuring floral decorations, boat races, traditional feasts, and folk performances throughout Kerala.

title: Ganesh Chaturthi
description: Festival celebrating Lord Ganesha's birth with elaborate idols, prayers, processions, and community gatherings.

title: Baisakhi
description: Harvest festival marking the Punjabi New Year, featuring music, folk dances, fairs, and joyous celebrations.

title: Navratri
description: Nine-night festival dedicated to Goddess Durga with devotional dances, prayers, music, and vibrant costumes.

title: Makar Sankranti
description: Kite-flying festival celebrating the sun's transition, marked by fairs, sweets, and colorful cultural events.

title: Rath Yatra
description: Annual chariot procession of Lord Jagannath, attracting millions of devotees and visitors to Puri city.

title: Lohri
description: Bonfire festival celebrating winter's end, with traditional dances, folk songs, sweets, and family gatherings.

title: Mahashivratri
description: Night of Lord Shiva worship observed across India with prayers, fasting, chanting, and temple celebrations.
